item.title: Docker 建立不同架構的 Image
item.description: 問題起源 看看人家，一個 latest 有這麼多種架構的版本 羨慕耶 我也想要編一個給我的樹莓派 執行環境 » docker version Client: Docker Engine - Community Version: 19.03.12 API version: 1.40 Go version: go1.13.10 Git commit: 48a66213fe Built: Mon Jun 22 15:41:33 2020 OS/Arch: darwin/amd64 Experimental: true Server: Docker Engine - Community Engine: Version: 19.03.12 API version: 1.40 (minimum version 1.12) Go version: go1.13.10 Git commit: 48a66213fe Built: Mon Jun 22 15:49:27 2020 OS/Arch: linux/amd64 Experimental: true containerd: Version: v1.2.13 GitCommit: 7ad184331fa3e55e52b890ea95e65ba581ae3429 runc: Version: 1.
